strings.intro: openHAB - "empowering the smart home" - vendor and technology agnostic open source home automation
strings.whatis: openHAB is a Java-based open-source home automation platform that integrates and combines a vast range of different smart home systems and technologies into one single solution.
strings.rules: On top of the unified abstraction layer all connected devices are available for the overarching automation rule engines and different user interfaces.
strings.bindings: Over 200 specific add-ons provide support for brands, devices, technologies and communication protocols. Examples are Z-Wave, Philips Hue, Amazon Echo, Chromecast and Sonos. Discover all available add-ons and supported devices and/or functions at: https://www.openhab.org/addons/
strings.automation_apps: The app has an action plugin for Tasker and Locale included.
strings.forum: The openHAB open source initiative strongly supports its vibrant community. The forum with over 13,000 registered users is a place to find guidance, help and inspiration. Join the openHAB community forum over at https://community.openhab.org
strings.report_issues: When you find an issue please report it in the forum or at https://github.com/openhab/openhab-android/issues
strings.translation: If you want to translate the app into your language join us at https://crowdin.com/project/openhab-android
strings.about_foundation: The openHAB Foundation e.V. is a nonprofit organization with the mission to educate the public about the possibilities and benefits of free and open smart home solutions. Learn about the mission and the services of the foundation under https://www.openhabfoundation.org
strings.oh_server: You need an openHAB server for this app.
strings.short_description: Vendor and technology agnostic open source home automation
strings.fdroid: The builds on F-Droid have FCM and crash reporting removed and therefore won't be able to receive push notifications from openHAB Cloud in real time, but delayed.
strings.fdroid_beta: You can install the beta version alongside the stable version.
strings.beta: Try out new features and give early feedback!
strings.play_beta: You can install the beta version alongside the stable version.
strings.changelog_play_beta: Bug fixes and stability improvements. Please visit https://github.com/openhab/openhab-android/releases for a detailed changelog.
